abilities.name: Underworld Door
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, you may attach a Psychic Energy card from your hand to 1 of your benched Psychic Pokémon. if you attached Energy to a Pokémon in this way, draw 2 cards.

attacks.name: Max Geist
attacks.effect: This attack does 30 more damage for each Psychic Energy attached to all of your Pokémon.
